name: ZFSmanager
body:
## ZFS administration tool for Webmin

This is in very early development, it is largely untested and should be avoided in production environments. That being said, try this out in a virtual machine or anywhere else where data is non-critical. My hope is that this will ultimately provide Webmin with similar ZFS functionality to FreeNAS and NAS4Free.

I am brand new to Perl and Webminâ€™s API. so first I apologize for the shabby state the code is in, second any further contributions are greatly welcomed. I am learning a fair amount about ZFS along the way as well.

I am currently developing this under ZFS on Linux in Centos 6.5, but all varients of ZFS/Webmin are planned to be supported in the future.

To install, grab a [release from github](https://github.com/jonmatifa/zfsmanager/releases), or repackage the current master as a tar and upload that to Webmin.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
